title: Introduction to PH2Pro: Headshot Photography Network & Coaching
summary: Peter Hurley introduces PH2Pro.com, a platform designed to train photographers in the art of headshot photography and connect them with clients. He outlines the history of the program, the benefits of joining the community, and the path from a free account to becoming a certified Associate Photographer.

steps.action: Sign up for a free account to get started.
Add a gallery and upload your current headshots or best photography work to build a portfolio.
Join the Protege coaching program to access educational content like videos, blog posts, and webinars.
Submit your gallery for review (upon invitation) to attempt to become a PH2 Associate Photographer.

key_takeaways: PH2Pro was created to capture clients with lower budgets by referring them to trained associate photographers.
The platform offers a 'Protege' coaching program with exclusive educational content to improve headshot skills.
Photographers can start with a free account and upload various types of photography if they don't have a headshot portfolio yet.
Achieving 'Associate Photographer' status involves a personal review by Peter Hurley and results in client referrals through the site.
